        parameterized constructor for this class that sets each of the class attributes
        Parameters:
        id - the users unique id
        password - the users sign in password
        firstName - users first name
        lastName - users last name
        emailAddress - users email address
        lastAccess - users last access date
        enrolDate - users enrol date
        enabled - if the user is enabled or not
        type - users type of faculty or student
